venue.name: Starting line of Nax O'hartford Race

item.description:
Max's O’Hartford 5K and Wee Mile o’fficially caps off Hartford's weekend St. Patrick's festivities on March 14, 2010. Join in this moving party through downtown streets.

Along the way, Irish bagpipers and Celtic fiddlers will entertain. The fun continues after your finish on the doorstep of Max Downtown, where Max's chefs will reward you with corned beef, Thomas Hooker's Irish Red Ale and much more.

http://www.hartfordma...

_______________________________________________________________________________

Hi, this is SAM. This looks like another "can't miss race." 1,720 registered runners last year.

I'll update this event with more details in the next month or so. Check out the web site.
item.name: Max's O'Hartford 5K
